events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it does not fit me at all and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's message contains keywords related to refund requests, categorising this case under Refund.
This case has been assigned to agent Emily for handling the refund request regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! This is Emily from customer support. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Thank you for your quick response. The order number is 123456, and the jacket is still unworn and packed exactly as it came.
Great! I have initiated the refund process. Please ship the jacket back to our return address within 7 days to complete the refund.
That's perfect, thank you. I will send the jacket back today and appreciate your help.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and everything was handled satisfactorily. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
